The royall slaue A tragi-comedy. Presented to the King and Queene by the students of Christ-Church in Oxford. August 30. 1636. Presented since to both their Majesties at Hampton-Court by the Kings Servants. Cartwright, William, 1611-1643.
[68] p.
Printed by William Turner for Thomas Robinson, Oxford : 1639.
By William Cartwright. Mostly in verse. Signatures: A-H⁴ I² . Reproduction of the original in University of Michigan. Library.
=======
